message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CC, cs.SY, cs.NI, cs.DS

Reasoning: 
1. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper proposes a new family of codes based on polar codes and list+CRC decoding, which are topics closely related to information theory.
2. cs.CC (Computational Complexity) - The paper discusses the performance of the proposed codes, which involves analyzing the computational complexity of the decoding algorithms.
3. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper proposes a new coding scheme that can be applied to communication systems, which falls under the category of systems and control.
4. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The proposed codes can be used in communication networks, which is a topic related to networking and internet architecture.
5. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper discusses the use of soft concatenation and list decoding, which are topics related to data structures and algorithms.
